fuzzydl

Class FuzzyConcreteConcept

  • java.lang.Object
    • fuzzydl.Concept
      • fuzzydl.FuzzyConcreteConcept
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrispConcreteConcept, LeftConcreteConcept, LinearConcreteConcept, ModifiedConcreteConcept, RightConcreteConcept, TrapezoidalConcreteConcept, TriangularConcreteConcept

    public abstract class FuzzyConcreteConcept
extends Concept
    Fuzzy concrete concept defined with an explicit membership function.
    Author:
    Fernando Bobillo
